reviewText: What a fine American Masters production!  It is accurate, insightful and engaging.  I know some of the interviewees, and it was interesting to hear their personal "takes" on working with Robbins. A fair and balanced, entertaining, and inspirational retrospective on one of the great creators of music theatre and ballet.
summary: A great tribute to a talented, troubled 20th century master
Title: Jerome Robbins: Something To Dance About - The Definitive Biography of an American Dance Master

reviewText: I knew many of the people associated with Jerome Riobbins though I never met him.  This DVD seems to be a very accurate and honest portrayal of the man, his talernt, his demons and his great contribution to American theatre whether it be on Broadway or the field of ballet.  It is pure joy to behold.
summary: This is a beautifully put together detailed account of a genius who changed and added to the musical theatre as well as to the
Title: Jerome Robbins: Something To Dance About - The Definitive Biography of an American Dance Master

reviewerName: John H. Marvin, Madison, WI - Broadway devotee
reviewText: At last a tribute to a great dancer and choreographer.  Brilliantly written and edited.  A must for dance teachers and anyone who loves dance!
Title: Jerome Robbins: Something To Dance About - The Definitive Biography of an American Dance Master

reviewText: An excellent documentary on the life of a true choreographic leader.  Well worth seeking out.
summary: Jerome Robbins: Something to Dance About
Title: Jerome Robbins: Something To Dance About - The Definitive Biography of an American Dance Master

reviewText: I watch this dvd over and over.  He was so ahead of his time.  A man of grace, talent and intelligence.
Title: Jerome Robbins: Something To Dance About - The Definitive Biography of an American Dance Master
